text: Beyond London Lights is a lost The Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog: Beyond London Lights 1928 American silent drama film directed by Tom Terriss and starring Adrienne Dore, Lee Shumway, and Bill Elliott. It is based on John Joy Bell's novel Kitty Carstairs, and is sometimes referred to by that title.Goble p.688 It was made by Film Booking Offices of America. The AFI Catalogo of Feature Films: Beyond London Lights ==Cast== * Adrienne Dore as Kitty Carstairs * Lee Shumway as John Risk * Wild Bill Elliott as Colin Drummond * Herbert Evans as Symington * Jacqueline Gadsden as Lady Dorothy * Florence Wix as Mrs. Drummond * Templar Saxe as Stephen Carstairs * Blanche Craig as Mrs. Bundle * Kathrin Clare Ward as The Landlady ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. title: Beyond London Lights
